overview:
Matthew is a new tech | social media enthusiast with a passion for the web and emerging technologies. He live just outside Glasgow, Scotland. He works for 360innovate a web desigh & developemnt agency based in Glasgow, where he specialises in SEO and Social Meida.

Over the past decade he has worked for some the world most innovate and succesful tech companies including HP, Dell, SAP and Samsung, this has allowed him to develop my skills in various areas of current technology. He is also a Microsoft Certified Professional with MCDST,MCSA and MCSE certifications.
